snippet: Gov. Mike Beebe’s decision followed an October recommendation by the Arkansas Parole Board that Kyle Beebe’s application for a pardon was “with merit.”
abstract: Arkansas Gov Mike Beebe, before leaving office in January 2015, plans to issue pardon to his son Kyle, who was convicted of felony drug offense in 2003.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mike Beebe’s decision followed an October recommendation by the Arkansas Parole Board that Kyle Beebe’s application for a pardon was “with merit.”

headline.main: Arkansas Governor to Pardon Son in 2003 Drug Offense
